thread.title: Anne Heche Is Heading to Quantico
thread.title_full: Anne Heche Is Heading to Quantico

author: TV Guide
title: Anne Heche Is Heading to Quantico
text: Anne Heche Is Heading to Quantico Anne Heche has been tapped to guest-star on Quantico... Comment Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 1:09 PM Updated at 4:30 PM Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 1:09 PM Updated at 4:30 PM Anne Heche has been tapped to guest-star on Quantico , TVGuide.com has confirmed. Heche, who most recently starred on USA's Dig , will play a former FBI agent and medical examiner named Dr. Susan Langdon, according to TVLine , which first reported the news. Now working as a commentator and bestselling author, Dr. Langdon heads to Quantico to offer a seminar on identifying catching serial killers. Quantico has proved to be a hit for ABC, which announced last week that the new drama was getting a full-season pickup . Quantico airs Sundays at 10/9c on ABC. Are you looking forward to meeting Heche's character? Other Links From TVGuide.com
